title: The Future of AI-Powered Web Development: How MCP-UI is Revolutionizing Interactive Applications

slides.text: MCP-UI connects the Model Context Protocol with dynamic components to generate interfaces from server logic.
AI reasoning and UI rendering work together, enabling adaptive, context-aware apps that react to user needs.
Developers get faster iteration: AI proposes layouts and content, while code keeps control and safety.
Result: rich, interactive experiences generated on demand, consistently styled and tuned for each scenario.
